verses.content: Chunawa khawm David le sipai hotuhai chun dârbenthek le, perkhuong le ṭingṭanghai le thu hril duol duola rawngbâwltu dingin Jeduthun le Heman le Asaph nau- pasalhai chu an ṭheh a; chun, an rawngbâwlna ang peia chuong sin- thawhai sinthawtuhai nizât chu hi hi a nih:
Asaph naupasalhai chu: Zakkur, Josef, Nethania le Asarela hai hi Asaph naupasalhai chu an nih, lal thupêk anga Asaph hnuoia thuhril- tuhai chu.
Jeduthun pâwl chu, Jeduthun naupasalhai chu Gedalia, Zeri, Jesaia, Simei, Hasabia le Mattithia hai, paruk hi an pa Jeduthun rawia ṭingṭang le LALPA chu inpâka lâwmthu hriltuhai chu an nih.
Heman pâwl chu: Heman nau- pasalhai chu: Bukkia, Mattania, Uzziel, Sebuel, Jerimoth, Hanania, Hanani, Eliatha, Giddalti, Romamti- ezer, Josbekasa, Mallothi, Hothir le Mahazioth hai an na;
hienghai po po hi Pathien thua saki mûta lal zâwlnei Heman nau- pasalhai an nih. Pathien chun Heman chu naupasal sâwmpali le naunuhmei pathum a pêk a.

Hienghai po po hi Pathien ina rawngbâwlnaa, ṭingṭanghai le dâr- benthekhai le perkhuonghai le LALPA ina hla pâwl dinga an pa hnuoia um an nih; Asaph hai, Jedu- thun hai, Heman hai chu lal thuhnuoiah an um sih a.
Chun, anni le an unauhai LAL- PA ta dinga hla sak dinga inchûk- tira uma, sak thiem tahai nizât chu za hni sâwmriet pariet an nih.
Chun, a chîn ni leh, a lien ni leh, inchûktirtu le inchûktu khawm, angkhat vawngin, an thil thaw ding chu aisânin an en hlak a.
Asaph ta dinga aisân pakhatna chu Josef chungah a tluh a; a pahnina chu Gedalia chungah; ama le a unauhai le a naupasalhai leh sâwm pahni an nih:
a pathumna chu Zakkur chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih.
a palina chu Izri chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai le chun sâwmpahni an nih;
a pangana chu Nethania chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai chu sâwmpahni an nih;
a parukna chu Bukkia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih:
a pasarina chu Jesarela chung- ah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a parietna chu Jesaia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a pakuona chu Mattania chung- ah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmna chu Simei chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpakhatna chu Azarel chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpahnina chu Hasabia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpathumna chu Subael chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpalina chu Mattithia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpangana chu Jeremoth chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmparukna chu Hanania chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpasarina chu Josbekasa chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmparietna chu Hanani chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpakuona chu Mallothi chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhnina chu Eliatha chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhni pakhatna chu Hothir chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
sâwmhni pahnina chu Giddalti chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhni pathumna chu Mahazioth chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhni palina chu Romam- ti-ezer chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih.
